overview: The lucky instructors at director Joey Silvera's fictitious school share a secret longing to be anally invaded by their gorgeous female pupils. Devotees of nasty role reversal will find that "Strap For Teacher 3," the legendary pornographer's latest exploration of perverse pegging scenarios, provides the perfect combination of serious femdom lust and the sort of silly, quirky vignettes Joey's hard-core fans expect.
title: Strap for Teacher 3
